text: nitalia. Unique is a source of information and support to families and individuals affected by rare chromosome disorders. On their Web site, they have a pamphlet that provides additional information on the signs and symptoms of 2q37 deletion syndrome. Click on the link below to view this information. http://www.rarechromo.org/information/Chromosome%20%202/2q37%20deletions%20FTNW.pdf The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for 2q37 deletion syndrome.
